activities: SRS provides a clearinghouse of messaging spam reports submitted by mobile consumers from participating mobile networks. Feedback from subscribers leveraging a spam reporting short code, will be aggregated into SRS.

privacyprograms: Cloudmark has been awarded TRUSTe's Privacy Seal signifying that this privacy policy and practices have been reviewed by TRUSTe for compliance with TRUSTe’s TRUSTed Cloud Program Requirements including transparency, accountability and choice regarding the collection and use of your personal information
